Define Documentation

#define GNUPLOT_STR_COMMAND (   NAME,
  ARG 
)
Value:
Command         \
      NAME (const char* ARG)    \
      {           \
  std::string command = #NAME;    \
  if (*ARG != 0)        \
    {         \
      command += " '";      \
      command += ARG;     \
      command += "'";     \
    }         \
  return Command (command);   \
      }
#define GNUPLOT_UNARY_COMMAND (   NAME)
Value:
Command         \
      NAME ()       \
      {           \
  return Command (#NAME);     \
      }
